items.title: Sales Executive
items.desc: Responsible for generating qualified leads, engaging prospective clients, presenting tailored solutions, and converting opportunities into measurable business growth.

items.title: Implementation Consultant
items.desc: Analyzing business requirements, configuring and implementing solutions, coordinating deployments, ensuring successful client adoption.

items.title: Remote Support
items.desc: Provides real-time assistance by diagnosing issues remotely, resolving queries, and ensuring uninterrupted system satisfaction.

items.title: SQL Developer
items.desc: Assists in SQL database queries, ensuring smooth system operations, resolving bugs, and supporting maintenance tasks.
